arts.ttl: ‘This team has created history’ - reaction to Shamrock Rovers’ Euro exit
arts.sum: He said: “It’s obviously a tough night to lose it on penalties, but everyone to a man put in a shift tonight and obviously on another night we probably win. We made it difficult for ourselves, playing 90 minutes in these two games with 10 players.

arts.ttl: Shamrock Rovers’ European dream comes to an end after shootout defeat
arts.sum: Eirik Hestad scored the winning penalty.

arts.ttl: Shamrock Rovers penalty decision against Molde has fans fuming
arts.sum: But Rovers fans believe they should have had a penalty in the 26th minute when Aaron McEneff was cleared out by the Molde goalkeeper. Shamrock Rovers fans were fuming after being denied a "stonewall penalty" in the first half of their Europa Conference clash with Molde at Tallaght Stadium this evening.

arts.ttl: Shamrock Rovers announce departure of two-time League of Ireland winner
arts.sum: The ex-Celtic and Rangers man won two League of Ireland Premier Division titles during his time on Rovers’ books - one with the Hoops in 2023 and again last season while on loan at Shelbourne. Shamrock Rovers have announced the departure of former Scotland Under-21 midfielder Liam Burt.

arts.ttl: Danny Mandroiu injury blow as Shamrock Rovers prepare for big Molde clash
arts.sum: Bradley said: "Danny Mandroiu will miss the next three or four weeks. New signing Adam Matthews also came off in that game and misses out tonight, but Gary O’Neill should make the squad despite limping off too.

arts.ttl: The money at stake for Shamrock Rovers ahead of their Europa Conference League clash with Molde
arts.sum: Shamrock Rovers stand on the verge of history on Thursday night as they prepare to take on Norwegian side Molde in the second-leg of their Europa Conference League play-off round tie. The draw has already been half-done, so Shamrock Rovers know the reward for progress on Thursday would be a tie with either Belgian side Cercle Brugge or Polish giants Legia Warsaw.

arts.ttl: Preview: Shamrock Rovers vs. Molde - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Conference League clash between Shamrock Rovers and Molde, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
